solution_line_template: 4 hours and 30 minutes is the same as {hours_tuesday}*{minutes_per_hour}+{extra_minutes_tuesday}=<<{hours_tuesday}*{minutes_per_hour}+{extra_minutes_tuesday}={total_minutes_tuesday}>>{total_minutes_tuesday} minutes.

At {minutes_per_movie} minutes per movie, Grandpa could watch a total of {total_minutes_tuesday}/{minutes_per_movie}=<<{total_minutes_tuesday}/{minutes_per_movie}={movies_tuesday}>>{movies_tuesday} entire movies in 4 hours and 30 minutes.
Thus, during these two days, he could have watched as many as {movies_tuesday}+{movies_wednesday}=<<{movies_tuesday}+{movies_wednesday}={total_movies}>>{total_movies} movies.
